product_name: Seirus Soundtouch All Weather Gloves - Women's
long_description: Make a call, send a text or choose the next set of tunes to listen to on your smartphone without freezing your fingers with the women's Seirus Soundtouch(TM) All Weather gloves. Thumbs and index fingers have a special material on them that lets you operate any touch-screen device without taking the gloves off. Highly water-resistant Weathershield(TM) shells keep most moisture from getting in. Fleece linings are warm and comfortable next to skin. The Seirus Soundtouch All Weather gloves have grippy palms to help you hold onto your smartphone and ski poles.
